name: Derwydd
description:
Note:  this game is still under development!

Meet 'Gwirth'!

Armed with only magical beans and a watering can, guide Gwirth on a journey to help protect the land and villagers from a deadly, corrupting force!

 

Controls

Movement:

    'W' = move up

    'A' = move left

    'S' = move right

    'D' = move down

Plant magic bean:

    '1' = change cursor to 'plant bean' 

    '2' = revert back to normal cursor

    left-click on a soil tile = plants a bean in the ground

(to quit, use ALT + F4 )

Known Issues

- Game window closes when all tiles are filled in.
